biotools.summary: Nanopanel2 (np2) is a somatic variant caller for Nanopore panel sequencing data. Np2 works directly on basecalled FAST5 files and outputs VCF and TSV files containing variant calls and associated statistics. It also produces haplotype map TSV and PDF files that inform about haplotype distributions of called (PASS) variants.
